title: I can't see my own group
body: I'm an owner of a group in League of Legends, and my other group members can see that I'm still the owner, but I can't see the group in my own client regardless of where I log in or play, and I can't add the tag as a result. This is becoming fairly frustrating, and has been going on for a week or two now. I'm hoping this is a temporary issue, and there's a fix that either Riot is working on or one that I can do myself. Any help and/or suggestions are greatly appreciated, thanks in advance!

replies.body: There were some issues with clubs after a recent outage, and a solution has since been found.  I'd be happy to take a look into your specific case to make sure  everything is in sync!  What's the name and tag of the club you own?  Let me know!

Our leader has same problem.
Club Name: Good Guys Wood Division
Club Tag: GGWD™
Leaders IGN: DeerHawk
hi, same problem my club name is: #weed#420   my summoner name is: thcfactor   (eune)  thanks for helping.
same problem! my clubs name is "i am not a nugget" and our tag is "FIGS"
I'm having the exact same problem for over a month (NA server) clan tag !!GG! clan name GeeGee. I'm the owner and the only one who can't access it. All my other friends and gf are still on it.

Same for me

i want my groupe back :/
Hope u help me
